items.label: 539fc91aec4f024d2f53ed92
items.description:
Additional Info:
*Following adjustments are applied to the rate(s):
**Renewable Energy Charge at $0.00050 per kWh 

**PURCHASED POWER ADJUSTMENT: There shall be an adjustment in rate due to cost of power as provided in the Department's Standard Purchased Power Adjustment Clause in effect from time to time.The cost per KWH for all energy will be adjusted upward or downward for changes in fuel and purchased power costs above or below the base amount of $.065 per KWH.

**HYDROPOWER REDUCTION: There shall be a reduction in rate due to power purchased from the Niagara hydroelectric projects provided in the Department's Hydroelectric Power Reduction Clause in effect from time to time. This reduction in rate may be further increased based on Department's owned hydroelectric facilities, at the discretion of the Department from time to time.

*METER SURGE PROTECTION: $3.75 per month if customers sign up.(reference: http://www.hged.com/161E.pdf)
items.name: RESIDENTIAL ELECTRIC SCHEDULE
